summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 VOLKSWAGEN PASSAT. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V078000 (AIR BAGS); HOWEVER, THE PART FOR THE RECALL REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE BURLINGTON VOLKSWAGEN DEALER STATED THAT PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE RECALL WAS NOT ACTIVE AT THE MOMENT AND THEY WERE ON THE WAITING LIST FOR THE REPAIR. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
